data.name: crayon add-on (modern)
data.description: Meant to be combined with (and installed after) crayon for mal.

data.name: WhatsApp chat heads and privacy
data.description:
Hide the names of your contacts and groups on the left side by only showing the icons.
The names will be made visible again after hovering your mouse over the icon.

This theme has evolved based on my own requirements, which was privacy.
On the longer term I might add additional features, however I will try to prevent the loss of features if possible.

data.name: Roam Light
data.description: A few visual tweaks to Roam (roamresearch.org) that make me enjoy using it more.

data.name: Facebook | Simpler and User-friendly
data.description:
This User-style makes out most of Facebook on Desktop.
You'll get new log-in, separated sections, fixed chat etc.
data.css:
@-moz-document domain(www.facebook.com) {

/*Login Page*/
._53jh {background-image: none !important;} /*removes gradient in login fields section*/
.fbIndex, ._50dz > div:nth-child(2), .fbIndex .gradient {background-color: #3b5998 !important; background: #3b5998 !important;} /*Blue Background everywhere*/
#pageFooter, ._58mk, ._58mu ._58mv, #loginbutton {display: none !important;} /*hide footer, login button and some text*/
._6s, ._2_68, ._58mt {color: #fff !important;} /*white color on text*/
._6t {color: #c0c0c0 !important;} /*Clearer font on welcome screen text*/
body {overflow: auto !important;} /*hide scroll bar*/
._1gbd:hover {box-shadow: 0 0px 0px 5px #dddfe2 !important;} /*solid box shadow in log with picture*/
#email {border-top-left-radius: 3px !important; border-top-right-radius: 3px !important; color: #3b5998 !important; font-size: 18px !important; text-align: center !important;} /*Email borders and text decoration*/
#pass {margin-top: 63px !important; margin-left: -287px !important; border-bottom-left-radius: 3px !important; border-bottom-right-radius: 3px !important; color: #3b5998 !important; font-size: 18px !important; text-align: center !important;} /*Password position, borders and text decoration*/
html ._44mg {margin-left: 182px !important;} /*password in new windows fix position*/
.menu_login_container .login_form_label_field label, .menu_login_container .login_form_label_field a {margin-left: -100px !important;} /*"Forgot account?" position*/
td.html7magic:nth-child(2) > label:nth-child(1) {margin-left: -73px !important;} /*"Password" text position*/
.menu_login_container .inputtext, .menu_login_container .inputpassword {border-color: #f6f7f9 !important;} /*Border colorfor Email and Password*/
.inputpassword {border: 1px solid #f6f7f9 !important;} /*Border size for Email and Password*/
.menu_login_container .inputtext, .menu_login_container .inputpassword {width: 265px !important; height: 54px !important;} /*Username&Password fields are bigger*/
.loggedout_menubar {width: 551px !important;} /*Width of the whole section in login gields*/
.loggedout_menubar .fb_logo {margin-top: 66px !important;} /*Facebook logo in center*/
.loggedout_menubar_container {height: 220px !important;} /*Height of the whole section in login gields*/
#facebook ._31nj {margin-left: 14px !important; font-size: 22px !important;} /*Popup login - password field position*/
.fb_content {min-height: 0px !important;} /*no scroll on smaler resolutions*/
._6wl {background: none !important; background-color: none !important; box-shadow: inset 0 0px 0px !important; border-color: #fff !important; transition: .3s ease-out !important;} /*Sign Up Button*/
._6wl:hover {background: #fff !important; color: #3b5998 !important; transition: .3s ease-out !important;} /*Sign Up Button Hovered*/
._t7b {background-color: transparent;} /*"X" button on login with picture*/
._m-- {padding-bottom: 0 !important; padding-top: 0 !important; height: 0 !important;} /*Blue background behind login with profile picture*/
._2pi6 {padding-bottom: 0px !important; padding-top: 0px !important; margin: 20px !important;} /*Blue background behind login with profile picture*/
.signupBanner .signup_btn {left: 450px !important; top: -133px !important;} /*SignUp dutton on new tab log in page*/

/*Graph Search and BlueBar*/
._4kny._2s24, ._4d1i._5-sk, #u_0_f > a:nth-child(1) {display: none !important;} /*Hides "Home" button and "?" mark*/
._585- {background-color: #29487d !important; border: 0px solid #3b5998 !important; border-radius: 0px !important; height: 43px !important; left: 25px !important; max-width: 500px !important; top: 0px !important;} /*Search/Graph search centered*/
._2q3u {height: 645px !important;} /*Messeges popup is longer*/
.jewelContent {width: 430px !important;} /*Messeges scrooll fix popup is longer*/
._4djt {background-color: #365899 !important; color: #fff !important; font-weight: 600 !important; padding: 9px !important; margin-left: -11px !important; font-size: 13px !important;} /*"See all in messenger" with blue bg*/
._33p7 {background-color: #e9ebee !important;} /*Messeges in new window search bar bg color*/
._585- ._5861, ._5861 ._586f, ._5861 ._1frb, ._5861 ._5eay {height: 43px !important; font-size: 24px !important; text-align: center !important;} /*Text field height and centered in graph search*/
._2s1x ._2s1y {border-bottom: 0 !important;} /*No border in bluebar*/
._5861 ._586f, ._5861 ._586i, ._5861 ._1frb {color: #fff !important;} /*Text field in graph search color*/
._585- ._4w98 {background: #29487d !important; border-radius: 0 0 0 0 !important;} /*Search icon with no radius*/
/*Fb extended logo in BlueBar*/
._19eb {background-image: url(https://static.xx.fbcdn.net/rsrc.php/v3/y2/r/KuTmU9Y4htf.png) !important;
width: 160px !important;
background-position: 34px -185px !important;
background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
background-size: 380px !important;}
#creation_hub_entrypoint, div._4kny:nth-child(4) {display: none !important;} /*Hides Create*/

/*Left Column*/
._5vb_.hasLeftCol #leftCol {width: 180px !important; padding-left: 0 !important;} /*Left Column position fixed*/
._3m75 ._bui {background-color: #fff !important; border: 1px solid #dddfe2 !important; border-radius: 4px !important;} /*Left Column white bg, border and border radius*/
._bui .sideNavItem {margin-left: 0px !important;}
._55y4 ._bui ._5afe {border-radius: 0px !important;} /*Left Column hover selector no radius*/
._55y4 ._bui .sideNavItem {width: 178px !important;} /*Left Column aligned selected with whole white bg*/
#left_nav_section_nodes {margin-top: -13px !important;} /*NewsFeed and Messenger are one section with profile name*/
._1k0o ._y-c {font-size: 10px !important; margin-top: -10px !important;} /*Smaller "See More"*/
#createNav {font-size: 10px !important; margin-top: -10px !important;}  /*Create ad, page, event and group*/

/*Right Side*/
div.t_1cvt3uz0-q:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) {display: none;}

/*NewsFeed*/
._495i {display: none !important;} /*"Viewing most recent stories · Back to top stories" gone*/
#facebook ._5s6c._5s6c, ._5s6c, ._dta, ._dta a, ._6m6 a,._fwx, ._fwx a, ._2lu6 {color: #4267b2;} /*Links and events now have blue color*/
._3eqz ._3ekx, ._2lu6 {border-bottom: 0 !important; background-color: #fff !important;} /*Simpler posts*/
._129h, ._69ad ._fmi {background-color: transparent !important;} /*Write a comment background*/

/*Messages in new windows backgorund color*/
._4sp8, ._5irm._7mkm {background-color: #e9ebee !important;}

/*Settings*/
body {background-color: #e9ebee !important;} /*Settings bg*/
.uiSideNav {background-color: #fff !important; border: 1px solid #dddfe2 !important; border-radius: 4px !important;} /*Settings left Column white bg, border and border radius*/

/*Pages*/
#u_jsonp {background-color: #fff !important; border: 1px solid #dddfe2 !important; border-radius: 4px !important; padding-left: 4px; margin-right: -1px;} /*Pages left Column white bg, border and border radius*/
._2fvv {padding-top: 8px !important; padding-bottom: 5px !important;}

/*Chat*/
._4mq3 .fbNubButton {width: 186px !important;} /*Chat width*/
.nubContainer ._4mq3.fbNub, .nubContainer ._4mq3.fbNub.openToggler {margin-right: -45px;} /*Chat close to the edge*/
._5j9- ._55oc {font-size: 9px; padding: 0 0 0 0;} /*"These contacts can't see you on chat. Edit" text in opened chat*/
._55ob {padding: 2px 0 5px 5px;} /*"These contacts can't see you on chat. Edit" text in opened chat*/
._5iwm ._58al {background-color: #e9ebee; border-top: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 0;} /*Search in opened chat*/
div._2phz {font-size: 10px;} /*Text for unmute chat is smaller*/
._s0f ._2sz2 {height: 400px;} /*Chat heads are bigger*/
._2eu_._llj {padding: 0px 0 50px 0 !important; height: 90px;} /*New friend welcome message fixed*/
._fj3 {height: 147px !important;} /*Page welcome cover photo fixed*/
.__6k {color: #4267b2;} /*Links and events now have blue color*/
.fbChatSidebarMessage {background-color: #e9ebee !important;}
.fbChatTypeahead ._5iwm ._58ak {padding-bottom: 0px !important;}

.uiList._5i_n._4kg._6-h._6-j._6-i {width: 611px !important; background-color: #fff !important; border: 1px solid #dddfe2 !important; border-radius: 4px !important;} /*Reactions (Like, Love, Haha .etc) in new tab*/

._2fvv {background-color: #fff !important; border: 1px solid #dddfe2 !important; border-radius: 4px !important; padding-left: 4px} /*Left Column in Events with white bg, border and border radius*/

.FriendRequestAdd {background-color: rgb(88, 144, 255);} /*Add Friend button*/

 /*Color of links, events, subjects etc*/
._5-cy, ._aqf, ._30gf {color: #365899 !important;}
}
